sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_K101Y ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , ACC_NO , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , START_DT , END_DT , PAY_METHOD , BUSN_AMT_SUM , BUSN_SUM_DDCT , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey# , #accNo# , #formCd# , #resid# , #name# , #datCd# , #startDt# , #endDt# , #payMethod# , #busnAmtSum# , #busnSumDdct# , #pdfDatAppYn# , #kybdr# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_K101Y SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , ACC_NO=#accNo# , FORM_CD=#formCd# , RESID=#resid# , NAME=#name# , DAT_CD=#datCd# , START_DT=#startDt# , END_DT=#endDt# , PAY_METHOD=#payMethod# , BUSN_AMT_SUM=#busnAmtSum# , BUSN_SUM_DDCT=#busnSumDdct# , PDF_DAT_APP_YN=#pdfDatAppYn# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND ACC_NO=#accNo#

UPDATE PDF_K101Y SET PDF_DAT_APP_YN=#pdfDatAppYn# , PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT = SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS'),0,8) , PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT = #pdfDatAppExcCtnt# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDDHHMISS') , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND ACC_NO=#accNo#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PDF_K101Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND ACC_NO=#accNo#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , ACC_NO , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , START_DT , END_DT , PAY_METHOD , BUSN_AMT_SUM , BUSN_SUM_DDCT , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT , PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_K101Y WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND ACC_NO=#accNo#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY , ACC_NO , FORM_CD , RESID , NAME , DAT_CD , START_DT , END_DT , PAY_METHOD , BUSN_AMT_SUM , BUSN_SUM_DDCT , PDF_DAT_APP_YN , PDF_DAT_APP_CMPL_DT , PDF_DAT_APP_EXC_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_K101Y WHERE 1=1 AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY DESC , ACC_NO ASC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM PDF_K101Y WHERE 1=1 AND DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
